text: (aakhir) too yaqeenee jahannumiyon mein hoga kya jo shakhs raat ke avaqaat mein sajada karake aur khade-khade (khuda kee) ibaadat karata ho aur aakherat se darata ho apane paravaradigaar kee rahamat ka ummeedavaar ho (naashukre) kaaphir ke baraabar ho sakata hai (ai rasool) tum poochho to ki bhala kaheen jaanane vaale aur na jaananevaale log baraabar ho sakate hain (magar) naseehat ibaraten to bas aklamand hee log maanate hain
